instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2327-a doesnt turn on, nothing on pp3v3_s5_reg, u7200 no enable sig
threads.message:
820-2327-a doesnt turn on, nothing on 3v3s5, u7200 has nothing on entrip (pin 6) for 3v3s5, resistor on entrip line is (r7272), problem is the schematic shows this resistor to be 57.6k, im getting a reading of 75k, BUT on the same model board that is working, on that same resistor i get a reading of just 3.1 ohms,

What i think I know: that pin 6 on u7200 (3V3S5_ENTRIP) is an enable signal telling u7200 to turn on pp3v3_s5_reg.... is this correct?
what i dont understand is if the resistor on that entrip line is supposed to be 57.6k, and on my bad board its 75K, yet on a good board its only 3.1 ohm....
is the schematic wrong or am i missing something serious?
*I'm new at this and I havent yet successfully fixed a board, I've watched a shitton of Louis's videos and am still learning...

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2327-a doesnt turn on, nothing on pp3v3_s5_reg, u7200 no enable sig
threads.message: Basics first. Green light present? PPBUS voltage?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2327-a doesnt turn on, nothing on pp3v3_s5_reg, u7200 no enable sig
threads.message:
yes green light, ppbus voltage is 4v 
also c7280 was short and getting hot originally, i replaced it

[SOLVED]820-2327-a doesnt turn on, nothing on pp3v3_s5_reg, u7200 no enable sig
threads.message: changed the fuse f7000 and now i get proper voltage on ppbus_g3h, still no power, will advise

threads.message: fuckin turns on now!!! HOT DAMN I FIXED ONE!!! LOL
